Package org.optim4j.ns

Class NeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.optim4j.ns.NeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A,​T>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - A valid solution agent type
    T - Partially destroyed solution agent type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optimizer<A>
    public class NeighborhoodSearchOptimizer<A extends Agent,​T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Optimizer<A>
    An implementation of neighborhood search optimization process.

    The implementation accepts a solution agent which is a local optima of the problem domain. The optimization process transforms the same using destroy and repair heuristic over multiple iterations. The new solution in each iteration is accepted based on provided acceptance criteria. The process continues until the completion condition is satisfied.

                                   Observer... observers)
        Constructs an instance of neighborhood search optimizer.
        Parameters:
        acceptanceCriteria - An acceptance criteria
        completionCondition - Completion condition of optimization
        repairer - Repairer to construct a valid agent from partially destroyed agent
        destroyer - Destroyer to destroy a valid agent to a partial solution
        observers - Observers to get notifications of optimization process

    • Method Detail

      • optimize

        public A optimize​(A agent)
        Executes the optimization process. Accepts a solution agent as input optimizes the same using destroy and repair process through multiple iterations following neighborhood search methodology and returns an optimum result.
        Specified by:
        optimize in interface Optimizer<A extends Agent>
        Parameters:
        agent - A valid solution agent representing a local optima
        Returns:
        An optimized solution agent
